adDetails: Whether you are looking for a tutor to give your kid a head start during summer or tutoring throughout the year, I gave you individual attention that "tutoring school" cannot and a price that is easily affordable. I offer private math tutoring in Algebra 1 and 2, Geometry, Trigonometry, Precalc, Math Analysis and Calculus AB or BC to all students in this area. I was also a math tutor at an adult education center and am comfortable working with adults too. If you need to improve your math skills and/or are taking your GED, CBEST or GRE exam, I can help you too. My hourly rate is $40 an hour at my home or yours. Please email me for references, or for more information.
